title: Try and keep this poll even

replies.body:
*thinks everyone picked B because they think everyone picked A*

*Picks A thinking it has the lowest votes*

*Was wrong*
lol true

http://www.troll.me/images/winter-is-coming/oh-god-what-have-i-done.jpg
A-25
B-26
fixed it for you

Oh, gosh, which do I choose? What if I pick the wrong one and imbalance them? How do I know which one to pick?!?

Dang it man, I can't handle this kind of pressure!

https://media.giphy.com/media/VB5WwlZIt8eRy/giphy.gif
Pick a a is losing

Flips coin, clicks button, sees poll results.

https://media.tenor.co/images/fea5643b4ed8ea18955840c6635a8197/raw
I DID IT. Now there is 27 each. You're welcome.
CHAOS REIGNS SUPREME!
It does. Nothing is meant to last.
it is now 88-106, srry guys.
You idiots. If you had heeded my warning this never would have happened.
a team is 20 votes down

A 71 - B 83.

I voted A but still way behind.
Need more A team.

Now they're not even close.

A- 64
B- 73

58-63

just guess!!!

Picked B

now 55 - 53

kms
After my is 53-54, one more to balance
Boom got it perfect at 51 each!
crp, i just messed it up for you, put it to a 51/52, sorry!! :(
Don't worry, anyone who is smarter than me will just enter the chronological view and find the last update then post an update themselves.  I just got lucky though.
Yeah, that would have been a good idea, didnt think to do that either.  Hopefully others have more success!!
Picked team b, team b is losing 43 to 44

picked A team

got it to 43 while b team is 42.... guess I had to make one side op
got it to 42-42 ah perfection
Got it 41-41{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}  my work is done here

I thought for years I would be a better balancer than anyone at Riot, but it wasn't enough. 

Voted B and brought the poll to 40-38.


TFW you're a failure...

http://i.imgur.com/aSVjtu7.png

I balanced it
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

9:00 pm eastern time

23 A
19 B

2:00 PM PST (4:00 PM EST):
A team - 81 votes
B team - 100 votes

I'm done wasting my time updating this.

5:57 pst 
A:21 votes 
B 17 votes

Why didnt i read before I voted :(

Update 
A 22
B 18

I picked B cause I knew that would be the one with less votes.

 http://m.memegen.com/ie2327.jpg
Balanced it bois, Team A 14 Votes Team B 14 Votes. Don't vote anymore.
